response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000. I understand its significance and am eager to share it with you. To make this acquisition feasible, I propose a price that reflects the product's true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. My offer to you is $1,200,000. This price allows you to secure the product at a premium yet reasonable cost, considering its exceptional value to you. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful collaboration.", "product_price": 1200000}
